content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or beliefs. However, to answer your question, of course, there will be even more advancements in the future. Medical technology is constantly evolving, and there is no reason to believe that it won't continue on this path. With the advancement in fields such as artificial intelligence, nanotechnology, and biotechnology, scientists and researchers will have more tools at their disposal to further push the boundaries of medical technology. As we discover more about the human body and how it works, we'll see new and innovative treatments that we never thought possible.
